data.name: Cultist Astronaut
data.detailed_description:
Travel Across the Cosmos and Obliterate Cultic Factions

Cults are scattered across the universe scheming, performing rituals, and polluting the cosmos with their heresy.


Cultist Astronaut is a 2D action adventure throughout a cult infested solar system. Travel planet to planet, explore civilizations corrupted by opposing factions, and fight back. The mission is to unify the universe under your cult under the old gods!

If you like classic shooter, platformers then this game is for you.

Game Features

  • Side-scrolling platformer shooter with wall sliding and gun choice
  • Tackle the cults in any order you choose!
  • Explore distinct planets across the Cosmos. Survive in apocalyptic wastes, delve into toxic caves, infiltrate necromantic towns, and crash a castle.
  • Absorb the souls of your enemies and power up your gameplay difficulty.
  • Unlock new weapons by defeating Cult leaders.
  • Challenge yourself to get a new highscore or beat the game at the highest soul level.

Explore a Bizarre Star System

The planets of Cultist Astronaut consist of ominous cults, twisted abominations, and hazardous locations to tackle.


One such planet called Necrorock is home to the Flayed Cult, an undead necromantic society who has removed their skin! As an unflayed heretic, you are not safe here. This planet is covered in radioactive waste, sawblades, and flayed abominations that will skin you alive.

data.short_description: Blast through this cultic platformer as a space-faring cultist hellbent on purging the galaxy of heretics! Travel to hazardous planets across the cosmos and eliminate opposing cults with your eldritch blaster.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

content_descriptors.notes: Enemies explode into pieces and surfaces are splattered with blood.
